```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DBI)         # low-level database interface, comparable to what we saw in Python
library(dbplyr)
library(duckdb)     # Specific to duckDB
library(here)
```

```{r}
# Create connection
conn <- DBI::dbConnect(duckdb::duckdb(), dbdir = here("lego.db"))

# List out tables in database
DBI::dbListTables(conn)
```

```{r}
sets <- dbGetQuery(conn, "SELECT * FROM sets")
```
